ECOWAS urges politicians in Senegal to urgently re-establish electoral calendarWest Africa's main economic and political bloc ECOWAS on Tuesday urged Senegalese politicians to urgently take measures to re-establish an electoral calendar in line with the constitution after parliament delayed the Feb. 25 presidential vote to December. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 16:53:17 GMT PEIVGTEUWJJ35LF5TCS2UE65NU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ecowas-urges-politicians-senegal-urgently-re-built-electoral-calendar-2024-02-06/Reuters世界非洲
Doctors in Gaza hospital "have to prioritise" patients most likely to surviveStaff and equipment are in such short supply in Gaza's European Hospital that medical teams are having to make agonising decisions about whom to accept, doctors said, leaving many patients with severe life-threatening injuries untreated. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 16:39:39 GMT LXCAPPWEGRPX5D37TOJDAULV5Q https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/doctors-gaza-hospital-have-prioritise-患者-most-likely-survive-2024-02-06/Arafat Barbakh世界中东
Blast at Indian firecracker factory kills 11, dozens injured - mediaAt least 11 people were killed and dozens injured on Tuesday after a blast ripped through a firecracker factory in central India's Madhya Pradesh state at midday, media reports said. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 16:34:33 GMT WQBGOGXWDZMHFPLYCJ5ZMLDAJA https://www.reuters.com/world/india/blast-indian-firecracker-factory-kills-11-dozens-injured-media-2024-02-06/Reuters世界印度
UN envoy in Iraq to step down at end of May, says country 'on a knife edge'The head of the United Nations political mission in Iraq, Jeanine Hennis-Plasschaert, told the Security Council on Tuesday she expected to step down at the end of May, adding the country was "on a knife edge". Tue, 06 Feb 2024 16:30:24 GMT LUEUH5H6NZOMTPVTJNNZ3SKUK4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-envoy-iraq-step-down-end-may-says-country-on-knife-edge-2024-02-06/Michelle Nichols世界中东
Death toll from Chile wildfires rises to 131The death toll from wildfires in central Chile has risen to 131, officials said on Tuesday, with most victims still unidentified in Chile's worst natural disaster in over a decade. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 16:29:30 GMT X6KKBDPP5VNJNB4ZY44LDRKFYI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/death-toll-chile-wildfires-rises-131-2024-02-06/Reuters世界美洲
Turkey's drone maker Baykar begins to build plant in UkraineTurkish defence company Baykar has started building a factory near Kyiv that will employ around 500 people and where it will manufacture either its TB2 or TB3 drone models, the company's chief executive told Reuters. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 15:39:15 GMT FQVGMN3EJJMXFKTJWDATRIL2RY https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/turkeys-drone-maker-baykar-begins-build-plant-ukraine-2024-02-06/Pesha Magid商业航空航天与国防
Palestinian Authority to pay reduced salaries as Israel blocks fundsThe Palestinian Authority said on Tuesday it will pay public sector workers 60% of their December salaries this week as it grapples with the longrunning fallout of Israel's refusal to transfer tax funds earmarked for Gaza. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 15:36:06 GMT HSUPQXGVS5KWTBNAT7ED7IGWDU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinian-authority-pay-reduced-salaries-israel-blocks-funds-2024-02-06/Ali Sawafta世界中东
Yemen Houthi leader says group will further escalate if attacks on Gaza do not stopThe leader of Yemen's Iran-aligned Houthis said on Tuesday that the group will further escalate if the Israeli attack on Gaza does not stop. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 15:26:46 GMT NZ7HCOD26JL3XEDTOMBW27F2VU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemen-houthi-leader-says-group-will-further-escalate-if-attacks-gaza-do-not-stop-2024-02-06/Reuters世界中东
Biden security adviser to meet with Mexico president on migration as border measures pendingU.S. Homeland Security adviser Elizabeth Sherwood-Randall will meet with Mexico's president later on Tuesday, he said, to discuss migration as the White House pushes for legislation to provide new funds for border security. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 15:24:29 GMT JD6STJO6BRI3NCW56P6JFSH3HI https://www.reuters.com/world/us/biden-security-adviser-meet-with-mexico-president-migration-border-measures-2024-02-06/Reuters世界美国
Bangladesh summons Myanmar envoy over border clashesBangladesh summoned neighbouring Myanmar's ambassador on Tuesday to protest the escalating border violence that killed two people on the Bangladeshi side as fighting between Myanmar's rebel forces and its junta regime intensifies. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 15:14:56 GMT NS4J4VI32FPGRIR4PK52KBICCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bangladesh-summons-myanmar-envoy-over-border-clashes-2024-02-06/Ruma Paul世界亚太地区
Argentina's lower house debate resumes ahead of senate voteLower-house lawmakers in Argentina on Tuesday will resume voting on individual articles of libertarian President Javier Milei's controversial reform bill, which received general approval late last week - paving the way for a decisive vote in the Senate. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 14:14:40 GMT GKXID4Z5UBKG3ISN2PF7FOJ2CE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/argentinas-lower-house-debate-resumes-ahead-senate-vote-2024-02-06/Walter Bianchi, Lucinda Elliott世界美洲
